snippet: The Accord, a sedan that doesn’t call attention to itself or to its owner, has long been a stalwart for Honda. But the 2013 model, which goes on sale on Wednesday, is so thoroughly pleasant that its buyers may be tempted to admit enjoying it.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of the 2013 Honda Accord.
lead_paragraph: The Accord, a sedan that doesn’t call attention to itself or to its owner, has long been a stalwart for Honda. But the 2013 model, which goes on sale on Wednesday, is so thoroughly pleasant that its buyers may be tempted to admit enjoying it.

headline.main: Accord: Once More With No Nonsense
headline.print_headline: Two New Heavyweights in the Midsize Ring: Accord: Once More With No Nonsense
